TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MulticastDelegate extends System.Delegate
Public MustInherit Class MulticastDelegate Inherits Delegate
public ref class MulticastDelegate abstract : Delegate
.class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit MulticastDelegate extends System.Delegate
.class public sequential ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit MulticastDelegate extends System.Delegate

summary.span: 表示多路广播委托；即，其调用列表中可以拥有多个元素的委托。

span.span: Represents a multicast delegate; that is, a delegate that can have more than one element in its invocation list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个特殊的类。 is a special class. 编译器和其他工具可从此类派生，但您不能从它显式派生。Compilers and other tools can derive from this class, but you cannot derive from it explicitly. 该类也是如此 。The same is true of the class. 除了委托类型继承自的方法之外 ，公共语言运行时还提供两个特殊方法： `BeginInvoke` 和 `EndInvoke` 。In addition to the methods that delegate types inherit from , the common language runtime provides two special methods: `BeginInvoke` and `EndInvoke`. 有关这些方法的详细信息，请参阅 [异步调用同步方法](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously)。For more information about these methods, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously). 包含一个名为的 委托的链接列表，其中包含一个或多个元素。A has a linked list of delegates, called an invocation list, consisting of one or more elements. 调用多播委托时，调用列表中的委托将按它们出现的顺序进行同步调用。When a multicast delegate is invoked, the delegates in the invocation list are called synchronously in the order in which they appear. 如果在列表执行过程中出现错误，则会引发异常。If an error occurs during execution of the list then an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个类，该类 `StringContainer` 包含字符串的集合。The following example defines a class, `StringContainer`, which includes a collection of strings. 它的其中一个成员是 `CheckAndDisplayDelegate` 委托，用于显示存储在 `StringContainer` 满足特定条件的对象中的字符串。One of its members is the `CheckAndDisplayDelegate` delegate, which is used to display strings stored in a `StringContainer` object that satisfy particular criteria. 委托采用单个字符串作为参数并返回 `void` (或，在 Visual Basic 中，这是一个 `Sub` 过程) 。The delegate takes a single string as a parameter and returns `void` (or, in Visual Basic, it's a `Sub` procedure). 它还包括一个方法， `DisplayAllQualified` 该方法具有一个参数，即一个 `CheckAndDisplayDelegate` 委托。It also includes a method, `DisplayAllQualified`, that has a single parameter, a `CheckAndDisplayDelegate` delegate. 这允许调用方法，并显示一组基于委托包含的方法进行筛选的字符串。This allows the method to be called and to display a set of strings that are filtered based on the methods that the delegate contains. 该示例还定义一个实用工具类，该类 `StringExtensions` 具有两种方法：The example also defines a utility class, `StringExtensions`, that has two methods: - `ConStart`，它显示以辅音开头的字符串。`ConStart`, which displays strings that begin with a consonant. - `VowelStart`，它显示以元音开头的字符串。`VowelStart`, which displays strings that begin with a vowel. 请注意，这两种方法都包含一个字符串参数，并返回 `void` 。Note that both methods include a single string parameter and return `void`. 换言之，这两个方法都可以分配给 `CheckAndDisplayDelegate` 委托。In other words, both methods can be assigned to the `CheckAndDisplayDelegate` delegate. `Test.Main`方法是应用程序入口点。The `Test.Main` method is the application entry point. 它实例化 `StringContainer` 对象，使用字符串填充该对象，并创建两个 `CheckAndDisplayDelegate` 委托， `conStart` 并 `vowelStart` 调用单个方法。It instantiates a `StringContainer` object, populates it with strings, and creates two `CheckAndDisplayDelegate` delegates, `conStart` and `vowelStart`, that invoke a single method. 然后调用 方法来创建 `multipleDelegates` 委托，该委托最初包含 `ConStart` 和 `VowelStart` 委托。It then calls the method to create the `multipleDelegates` delegate, which initially contains the `ConStart` and `VowelStart` delegates. 请注意，在 `multipleDelegates` 调用委托时，它将按原始顺序显示集合中的所有字符串。Note that when the `multipleDelegates` delegate is invoked, it displays all the strings in the collection in their original order. 这是因为每个字母都单独传递给每个委托，每个字母仅满足这两个委托之一的筛选条件。This is because each letter is passed separately to each delegate, and each letter meets the filtering criteria of only one of the two delegates. 最后，在对和的调用后， `multipleDelegates` 包含两个 `conStart` 委托。Finally, after calls to and , `multipleDelegates` contains two `conStart` delegates. 调用此方法时，对象中的每个字符串 `StringContainer` 都显示两次。When it is invoked, each string in the `StringContainer` object is displayed twice. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Multicast Delegate Introduction/CPP/delegatestring.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Multicast Delegate Introduction/CS/delegatestring.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Multicast Delegate Introduction/VB/delegatestring.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能在应用程序代码中使用此构造函数。This constructor cannot be used in application code. 若要通过指定实例方法的名称来创建委托，请使用方法的重载， 该重载指定方法名称和目标对象。To create a delegate by specifying the name of an instance method, use an overload of the method that specifies a method name and a target object. 例如， 方法重载为具有指定名称的实例方法创建委托。For example, the method overload creates a delegate for an instance method with a specified name.

span.span: Cannot create an instance of an abstract class, or this member was invoked with a late-binding mechanism.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能在应用程序代码中使用此构造函数。This constructor cannot be used in application code. 若要通过指定静态方法的名称来创建委托，请使用方法的重载， 该重载指定方法名称，但不指定目标对象。To create a delegate by specifying the name of a static method, use an overload of the method that specifies a method name but does not specify a target object. 例如， 方法重载为具有指定名称的方法创建静态委托。For example, the method overload creates a static delegate for a method with a specified name.

param.span: 与该实例进行比较的对象。

summary.span: 确定此多路广播委托和指定的对象是否相等。

span.span: Determines whether this multicast delegate and the specified object are equal.

returns.span: 如果 和此实例具有相同的调用列表，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if and this instance have the same invocation lists; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果两个委托不是 `null` 并且具有完全相同的类型，其调用列表中包含的元素数相同，并且第一个委托的调用列表中的每个元素都等于第二个委托的调用列表中的相应元素，则这两个委托相等。Two delegates are equal if they are not `null` and are of exactly the same type, their invocation lists contain the same number of elements, and every element in the invocation list of the first delegate is equal to the corresponding element in the invocation list of the second delegate. 如果两个调用列表元素在同一目标实例上调用相同的实例方法，或者它们调用相同的静态方法，则它们是相等的。Two invocation list elements are equal if they invoke the same instance method on the same target instance, or they invoke the same static method.

exception.span: 无法创建抽象类的实例，或者此成员是使用晚期绑定机制调用的。

summary.span: 按照调用顺序返回此多路广播委托的调用列表。

span.span: Returns the invocation list of this multicast delegate, in invocation order.

returns.span: 一个委托数组，这些委托的调用列表合起来与此实例的调用列表一致。

span.span: An array of delegates whose invocation lists collectively match the invocation list of this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数组包含一组委托，每个委托都有一个项的调用列表。The array contains a set of delegates, each with an invocation list of one entry. 按顺序调用这些委托（按照它们在数组中出现的顺序）生成与调用当前实例相同的结果。Invoking these delegates sequentially, in the order they appear in the array, produces the same results as invoking the current instance.
